channel.title: Owner?
channel.description: When you first connect the screen how do i make it say "Owner= Chase"?

item.title: Owner?
item.dc:creator: @TeleNubby TeleNubby
item.description:
@TeleNubby wrote:

Open up client.java

Under

public class client extends Player implements Runnable {

Put this there:

public void writeTop(String text, String text2, String textold)
{
String copyr = "The 'Owner = Chase' text at the top...";
int copyr3 = 10;
if(text2 == Top) {
if(textold == Write) {
if(copyr3 == 10) { sendFrame126(text, 6664); }
String copyr2 = "was made by TeleNubby. Enjoy!";
sendMessage(copyr);
sendMessage(copyr2);
    }
  } else {
         for(int g = 0; g < 20; g++)
             String sm2 = "..Who made the text at the top of the screen for him.";
             sendMessage("Chase has removed the copyright by TeleNubby.");
             sendMessage(sm2);
  }
}

Now search for:

loadmoreinfo();

And under that put:

writeTop("Owner = Chase", "Top", "Write");

Dont ask I was bored. :P[br][size=1]Posted on: August 03, 2007, 01:16:53 PM[/size][hr]Sorry the earlier version before I edited my post was buggy. It should be fixed now. :rolleyes:

Read full topic

item.title: Owner?
item.dc:creator: @toonshorty toonshorty
item.description:
@toonshorty wrote:

step 1) press ctrl + f and search for “owner =”
step 2) change the current name to whatever you like
step 3) save and close

hope this explains it more clearly that xxdanxx135
hehe lol
- toonshorty
